column5: What do you carry or is your fave?  Here's mine..  http://sogknives.com/store/VL-01.html
Hey GCD, that's a tasteful choice in blades ya got there!
Columbia River Knife and Tool: CRKT Mirage.  I have never owned a better knife.

I alternate between this one that I have had for many years.I dont like that the blade does not lock but its a nice light pocket knife. http://www.wrcase.com/knives/view_all/brow...1&Item=0262 This is the one I usually carry at work.Nice stout locking blade that holds an edge very well.Given to me by a bud a couple of years ago...Thanx Dawg! http://www.bladematrix.tv/browseproducts/B...ndle-knife.html Good Thread! Joe
Always with me excepy Airports and Showers.
